Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 61st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1984...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 1/31/1985 (Going to STL: P T. Burns, 2B M. Lemke. Going to CHC: P B. Burns)...
Injured on 6/28/1988 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1989, off Scott Garrelts (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1989, off Dave Stieb (LA)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1989, hitting .311 with 7 HR, 94 RBI...
